means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 普莱耶职业名称，演员或音乐家或绰号，运动优胜者来源于中世纪英语，含义是“表演”(to play)
physical layer controller 物理层控制器

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"演员"之意
means: actor ：指在舞台剧、电影、电视剧或广播剧中以演出为职业的男演员，侧重扮演的角色。
player ：侧重指职业或业余舞台演员。
performer ：使用广泛，不仅可指舞台或影视演员，而且可指舞蹈演员、乐器演奏等的演员，侧重在观众面前的实际表演。

sentence.Network_en: A fellow doesn't last long on what he has done. He's got to keep on delivering as he goes along.--Carl Hubbell, Baseball Player
sentence.Network_cn: 靠过去完成的无法让人保有成功，必须在路上持续交出成绩。

sentence.Network_en: As a player he was unselfish, a true team man.
sentence.Network_cn: 作为一名选手，他毫无私念，真正把自己摆在团队中。

sentence.Network_en: His playing as a trumpet player was quite revolutionary.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的小号演奏独创一格。

encyclopedia.content: player有三种含义 1.误入半条命(HL)服务器的反恐精英(CS)玩家。 ----因为CS1.5是半条命Half Life的MOD，两个游戏可以在游戏中相互进入对方的服务器，因此很多CS玩家不小心进入了半条命的游戏，而他们默认的名字都是player。这类误入HL服务器的CS玩家被称作player。player的特点是使用freeman的角色皮肤，而且玩半条命的技术很低，经常被专业半条命玩家大比分胜出，有时甚至以几百比零的比分惨败。 2.玩家 ----英文的play是玩的意

entry.tran: 运动员；选手；参加运动者
entry.def: A player in a sport or game is a person who takes part, either as a job or for fun.

example.tran: 他作为运动员的伟大之处

example.ex: She was a good golfer and tennis player.
example.tran: 她是一名高尔夫球和网球好手。

entry.def: You can use player to refer to a musician. For example, a piano player is someone who plays the piano.
If a person, country, or organization is a player in something, they are involved in it and important in it.

example.ex: Big business has become a major player in the art market...
example.tran: 大公司已成为艺术市场上的重要力量。

example.ex: America is not a party to the negotiations, yet it is a key player...
example.tran: 美国不是谈判的一方，但却扮演着关键的角色。

example.ex: Oscar nominations went to all five leading players.
example.tran: 5名主演均获得了奥斯卡提名。

means.word_mean: 1. a person who participates in or is skilled at some game
2. someone who plays a musical instrument (as a profession)
4. an important participant (as in a business deal);

sentences.sentence: "he was a major player in setting up the corporation"

Sentence.sentence: Scientists agree that key player in this scenario is the West Antarctic ice sheet, a Brazil-size mass of frozen water that is much as 7000 feet thick.

means.word_mean: 游戏者；运动员；参赛选手

sentences.en: The two British players both won their first-round matches in aggressive style.
sentences.cn: 两名英国选手都以进攻性风格在他们的第一轮比赛中获胜。

sentences.en: The two tennis players have fought five rounds but still can’t fight it out.
sentences.cn: 这两个网球手打了五个回合还不能决出高下。
